attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MnRMJvaG1edZjigaMxH_description
attribs.current: The target's Strength score is reduced by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MnRMJvaG1edZjigaMxI_description
attribs.current: The ghost eater can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MnRMJvaG1edZjigaMxJ_description
attribs.current: While in dim light or darkness, the ghost eater can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MnRMJvaG1edZjigaMxK_description
attribs.current: While in sunlight, the ghost eater reverts to its corporeal form.

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current: Exhaustion, Frightened, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Prone, Restrained

attribs.name: npc_resistances
attribs.current: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Thunder; Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing From Nonmagical Attacks
